long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Installation is not required, just visit: https://sodeve.net/sencha/json-table-editor/
 
Tired of editing JSON in tree-mode interface? Try JSON Table Editor!

You can easily load any JSON structure and edit it in a Grid/Table interface. You can also duplicate rows, sort, order or paste text to the Grid Editor.

Thinking of editing multi-level of JSON array object? Don't you worry! JSON Table Editor can handle that too!

You saw an interesting remote JSON/CSV data? Just paste the URL and we will load it for your!

Still thinking? Just try and shout your feedback. It's totally FREE!

Updates :
08-Jun-2023: Column expand/collapse (expanding/collapsing object-type column)
24-Aug-2022: Improved data loading speed
17-Aug-2022: Enhanced grid filters
01-Aug-2022: Save to browser's local storage
16-Feb-2020: Bug fixes (https://sodeve.net/2020/02/json-table-editor-enhancements-part-5/)
16-Aug-2019: Share your data by embedding the table
04-Apr-2018: Load remote JSON/CSV directly, URL Shortener, and upload to Paste 
Sites (PasteBin, HasteBin, DPaste)

07-Oct-2015: Bug fix - now able to load non linear JSON.
